ValidationRule.description: Customer name cannot include numbers or the voucher will fail to generate
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Voucher") && (CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.FirstName, TEXT(1)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.FirstName, TEXT(2)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.FirstName, TEXT(3)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.FirstName, TEXT(4)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.FirstName, TEXT(5)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.FirstName, TEXT(6)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.FirstName, TEXT(7)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.FirstName, TEXT(8)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.FirstName, TEXT(9)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(0)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(1)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(2)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(3)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(4)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(5)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(6)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(7)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(8)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(9)) || CONTAINS(CustomerC__r.LastName , TEXT(0))) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Claim_Status__c, 'Draft')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Claim_Status__c, 'Cancelled'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Customer name must not contain numbers
